required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of mRNA-6231 in Healthy Adults
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Dose-Escalation Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of a Single Administration of mRNA-6231, Encoding for a Human Serum Albumin - Interleukin-2 Mutein Fusion Protein (HSA-IL2m), in Healthy Adults

brief_summary.textblock: The main goal of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of escalating doses of a single subcutaneous (SC) administration of mRNA-6231.

detailed_description.textblock: Dose levels of mRNA-6231 are planned to be investigated in a dose-escalation manner.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Events (AEs) and Serious AEs

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Concentration (Cmax) of mRNA (Serum) and SM-86 (Plasma)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose (1 hour prior to study drug administration), 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, and 8 hours postdose on Day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-Time Curve (AUC) of mRNA (Serum) and SM-86 (Plasma)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose (1 hour prior to study drug administration), 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, and 8 hours postdose on Day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Maximum to Observed Effect (TEmax) after a Single Administration of mRNA-6231
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose (1 hour prior to study drug administration), 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, and 8 hours postdose on Day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Effect (Emax) after a Single Administration of mRNA-6231
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose (1 hour prior to study drug administration), 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, and 8 hours postdose on Day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Effect Versus Time Curve (AUEClast) after a Single Administration of mRNA-6231
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose (1 hour prior to study drug administration), 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, and 8 hours postdose on Day 1

intervention.description: Sterile frozen liquid dispersion for injection

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Understand and agree to comply with the study procedures and provide written informed consent
Key Exclusion Criteria:
- Has received any investigational product (for example, study drug, biologic, device) within 30 days or 5 elimination half-lives, whichever is longer
- Pregnant or lactating women
- Men and women of childbearing potential without effective contraception during the study
- Has any lab abnormalities or clinically significant medical condition that could interfere with the interpretation of study results or limit the participant's enrollment
